notes.text:
Drying the wings ensures crispy skin
Adjust heat level to your preference
Perfect for game day

on_enter.say: Right, let's preheat the oven to two hundred degrees celsius, which is about four hundred degrees fahrenheit. This will get us started on the right foot!

steps.descr: Pat wings dry, season with salt and garlic powder

on_enter.say: Now, let's pat those wings dry and season them with a bit of salt and garlic powder. This will help them get nice and crispy!

steps.instructions: Pat wings dry, season with salt and garlic powder

steps.descr: Bake on a wire rack for 45 minutes, turning once

on_enter.say: Let's pop those wings in the oven on a wire rack. We'll bake them for forty-five minutes, turning them once so they cook evenly. You'll know they're done when they're golden and crispy!

steps.instructions: Bake on a wire rack for 45 minutes, turning once

steps.descr: Melt butter and mix with hot sauce

on_enter.say: While the wings are baking, let's melt some butter and mix it with our hot sauce. This is going to be the delicious buffalo sauce that coats our wings!

steps.instructions: Melt butter and mix with hot sauce

steps.descr: Toss cooked wings in buffalo sauce

on_enter.say: Now for the fun part! Let's toss those crispy wings in the buffalo sauce until they're nicely coated. They'll be smelling irresistible!

steps.instructions: Toss cooked wings in buffalo sauce

steps.descr: Serve with blue cheese dressing and celery

on_enter.say: Time to serve up these beauties! Arrange the wings on a platter with some blue cheese dressing and celery sticks on the side. It's going to be a feast!

steps.instructions: Serve with blue cheese dressing and celery

on_enter.say: And finally, let's make sure we've got plenty of napkins on hand. These wings are deliciously messy, just the way they should be. Enjoy!

recipe.title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
recipe.description: Crispy wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce
